descriptionMdByRank.1: ATK is increased by **12%**. When the wielder casts [Intro Skill](https://wutheringwaves.fandom.com/wiki/Intro_Skill) or inflicts [Negative Status](https://wutheringwaves.fandom.com/wiki/Negative_Status), they gain **8%** Resonance Liberation DMG Bonus, stacking up to 3 times for 15s. At max stacks, when Resonators in the team inflict Negative Status, grants **24%** All-Attribute DMG Bonus for 15s. Effects of the same name cannot be stacked.
